name: TargetR
overview:
We provide an advanced digital signage solution designed to run on low cost devices such as Android, Google TV and Raspberry Pi.

The TargetR platform displays a sequence of digital content on any screen and provides full remote control and monitoring using a web-based administration interface.

Channels of images, videos and web content can be created and displayed on an unlimited number of devices. Data delivery and channel playback is managed by an advanced, multi-user system that maintains statistics and reports on content displayed. Content can link to third party web pages making the platform ideal for advertising and engaging with customers.
